parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables/disables UI functionality which is responsible for sending text or voice chat to the given chat channel. If the channel was disabled in [[Description.ext]] or [[server.cfg]], it can be enabled with this command, however the UI functionality changes will be local to the PC executing this command.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
This command:
* cannot disable Global channel for the admin or server host, because Global channel is always available for the admin
* does not disable ''incoming'' text or voice
* Prior to Arma 3 v2.01.146856 did not interrupt own client's transmission in progress (but prevented any further ones)
* does not affect chat related scripting commands such as [[vehicleChat]], [[globalRadio]] etc.
</value></part></template>

{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center"
! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"16" <template><title>!</title></template>  [[Channel IDs|Channel ID]] number correspondence
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"6" <template><title>!</title></template> Default Channels
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"10" <template><title>!</title></template> Custom Channels
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>- style<template><title>=</title></template>"font-size: .9em" 
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Global
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Side
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Command
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Group
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Vehicle
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Direct
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;2
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;3
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;4
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;5
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;6
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;7
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;8
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;9
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> CC&nbsp;10
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 2
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 3
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 4
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 5
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 6
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 7
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 8
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 9
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 10

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 14
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 15
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> channelID [[enableChannel]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> channelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|channel ID]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable, [[false]] to disable (both VoN and chat)

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> channelID [[enableChannel]] [chat, VoN] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.59.135661</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> channelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|channel ID]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [chat, VoN]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> chat: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable text chat

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> VoN: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to enable voice chat

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>0 [[enableChannel]] [[false]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Disable user ability to send voice and text on global channel</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>0 [[enableChannel]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[true]], [[false]]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Enable user ability to send text but disable voice on global channel</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentChannel]], [[setCurrentChannel]], [[getPlayerChannel]], [[channelEnabled]], [[radioChannelCreate]]
</value></part></template></root>
